name: svelte-devtools
description: An extension that allows inspection of Svelte component hierarchy and state in the Firefox and Chrome developer tools.

scripts.dev: http-serve test/public -p 8940 & web-ext run --bc -s dest -u http://127.0.0.1:8940 -u about:debugging && kill $!
scripts.build:icon: for size in 16 24 48 96 128; do if [ src/svelte-logo.svg -nt dest/icon-$size.png ]; then inkscape src/svelte-logo.svg -z -e dest/icon-$size.png -w $size; fi; done
